Posted recently to another list, please let us know if you encounter 
this sword.
-t

It is embarrassing for me to tell you that I have lost a valuable sword.
It was sent Global Express Mail .  It was routed to Mexico instead of to
Tokyo, according to EMS in San Francisco. We are still awaiting response
from Mexico but it should be shortly.
In the meantime if this has been lost or stolen someone may attempt to have
it valued or try to sell it at the S.F. Taikai.
If approached please alert security.  I will be there with full description
and oshigata and photo.
Shinsakuto signed: Musashi no Kuni ju Kato Chozaemon Sanehira saku
Dated: Showa 47, Feb. (1972)
28.11 nagasa, width 1.38in  .79 sori
horimono: Bohi on both sides
Full polish
In shirasaya, The saya is in an unusual  white cloth bag with tie string.
It was appraised at 480,000 yen or now something over $4000. dollars.
Your help would be most appreciated.

sincerely
Bill De La Grange
grange@...
